subject: JUnit testing for MIDP applications?
msgSnippet: Has anyone ported junit to MIDP and J2ME yet? I m working on an application, and I d like to avoid reinventing the wheel if possible :) Thanks, bab ... Brian
messageBody:
Has anyone ported junit to MIDP and J2ME yet? I'm working on an application,
and I'd like to avoid reinventing the wheel if possible :)

Thanks,
bab
